Ebbro 43072 Nissan Skyline 2000 GT-R (PGC10) 1969 JAF Grand Prix Clubman Race Winner T. Shinohara

Purchased: 2014

Just 3 months after the release of the Skyline GT-R (PGC10) in February, 1969 5 of them were entered in the 1969 JAF Grand Prix Clubman race. 2 were entered by Prince Motor Club Sports (PMC-S) and 3 by Sports Car Club of Nissan (SCCN). Takamichi Shinohara qualified 8th in his SCCN Skyline and finished in second place behind Harekuni Takahashi's Toyota 1600GT. Takahashi was given a 1 lap penalty for interference giving Shinohara the win. 4 of the 5 Skylines finished the race in 1st, 2nd, 4th, and 5th places. A very impressive result for the Skyline in it's very first race!

Check out some live action here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PAQLmhkMp7M
